comments.author: Greg
comments.body: Wish I could join you guys today but my meeting schedule won't allow.

comments.author: Scott
comments.body: 78 and sunny in San Diego today; nice little canyon run with what passes for hills in Sorrento Valley. Finally some decent warm weather. Would've enjoyed getting pounded by Mr.U on Flag instead, tho. SDB

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Hey, Bro! Though I need to get out for some Emma/Owen/Curley time, you're long overdue for a Boulder visit. Dave wants to hurt you on the climbs (paraphrased quote). Love, SMB
